scripts.pnpm_install_build_authserver: cd AuthServer && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.pnpm_install_build_blogserver: cd BlogServer && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.pnpm_install_build_realtimeserver: cd RealtimeServer && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.pnpm_install_build_adminclient: cd AdminClient && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.pnpm_install_build_userclient: cd UserClient && pnpm i && pnpm run build
scripts.build_client: pnpm i && concurrently  "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_adminclient" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_userclient"
scripts.build_backend: pnpm i && concurrently "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_authserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_blogserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_realtimeserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_commonservices"
scripts.build: pnpm i && concurrently "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_authserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_blogserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_realtimeserver" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_commonservices" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_adminclient" "pnpm run pnpm_install_build_userclient"
scripts.backend: concurrently "pnpm run pnpm_run_authserver" "pnpm run pnpm_run_blogserver" "pnpm run pnpm_run_realtimeserver"
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm run pnpm_run_userclient" "pnpm run pnpm_run_adminclient" "pnpm run pnpm_run_authserver" "pnpm run pnpm_run_blogserver" "pnpm run pnpm_run_realtimeserver"
